<NEW - DINOBOT/VICE GRIP>

There was a nod from VICE GRIP, "Yes, =
why send a Prime out now?  And they would likely to have at least an escort=
, or an honor guard.  Probably elite soldiers and veterans, perhaps those w=
ho fought in the GREAT WAR."

As much as he enjoyed combat against MAXIMAL =
OPPRESSORS, the thought of taking a PRIME on in combat along with their per=
sonal escort would be suicide, even by his standards.

If such a powerful s=
oldier was here, then why would he also be attempting to engage in a truce =
wtih the PREDACONS?

DINOBOT offered as a 'suggestion' to HYDRAS, "Garner a=
s much intelligence as you can from this newcomer as to waht the circumstan=
ces are, and attempt to negotiate for as full a price as you can for our di=
rect..  Assistance.  So that we might have a full picture of circumstances.=
"
